sentences.en: A trip to the Beijing Zoo will amaze your children.
sentences.cn: 到北京动物园会使你的孩子们感到惊奇.

sentences.en: Are there any shots that you actually amaze yourself by playing?
sentences.cn: 是不是有些球让你自己都为之陶醉?

sentences.en: Dave amazed his friends by suddenly getting married.
sentences.cn: 戴夫突然结婚，令朋友们非常吃惊。

sentences.en: He never ceases to amaze me.
He stood in amaze at the sight.
sentences.cn: 他看到那种景象,惊愕得呆呆地站在那里.

sentences.en: I amaze myself how incredible actually I use my talent to win.
sentences.cn: 我对自己充分利用自己的天赋来赢球这点感到很满意.

sentences.en: It never ceased to amaze him, and he never attempted to explain it.
sentences.cn: 他一直感到很惊奇, 但从未试图解释它.

sentences.en: It never ceases to amaze me how the business world continues to trivialize the world's environmental problems.
sentences.cn: 商界一直不重视世界环境问题，总让我惊讶不已。

sentences.en: Neil's ability to utter banalities never ceased to amaze me.
sentences.cn: 每次我都很惊讶，尼尔怎么能讲出这么索然无味的东西。

sentences.en: She continues to amaze us with art that is different.
sentences.cn: 她继续用与众不同的艺术带给我们惊喜.

sentences.en: The arrogance and selfishness of different interest groups never ceases to amaze me.
sentences.cn: 不同利益集团的傲慢和自私总是会让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: The Riverside Res-taurant promises a variety of food that never ceases to amaze!
sentences.cn: 滨河饭店总能提供品种繁多、令人称奇的食物。

sentences.en: The silk's elegance and palace's mightiness amaze the guests.
sentences.cn: 丝绸的华丽与典雅,宫廷的大气与尊贵,令与会的嘉宾心醉神迷.

sentences.en: This campaign strikes amaze into men.
WIDOW ST. CLAIR: Now, young man, you really amaze me!
sentences.cn: 圣克莱尔寡妇: 哦, 年轻人, 你真令我吃惊.

sentences.en: You will soon amaze the world with your brilliant feat.

words.tran_cn: 使…吃惊；把…弄糊涂（amaze的过去分词）
